comment.author: 24302898@N08
comment._content:
The aircraft is the American Electric Piranha.  She was a privately constructed aircraft purpose built for a 1965 USAF light counter-insurgency competition. Capable of carrying rocket tubes on the wingtips and a 500 pound bomb on the centreline, she withdrew prematurely from trials.  Refrences can be found in Wayne Mutza's excelent book "Gunships: The Story of Spooky, Shadow, Stinger and Spectre."http://www.specialtypress.com/vstore/showdetl.cfm?Product_ID=2145&DID=8

Cheers,

A. C.
